title: Elven leather helm/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Elven_leather_helm "Elven leather helm")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   精灵皮帽   [![Elven leather helm.png](/images/0/02/Elven_leather_helm.png)](/wiki/File:Elven_leather_helm.png) |                                                                                                                 |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                                              | 皮帽                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                 |
| 装备槽位                                                                                                            | [头盔](/wiki/%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "头盔")                                                                             |
| AC                                                                                                              | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)") |
| 特殊效果                                                                                                            | *（无）*                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                 |
| 基础价                                                                                                             | 8 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                           |
| 重量                                                                                                              | [3](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                     |
| 材料                                                                                                              | [皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")                    |

**精灵皮帽**（elven leather helm）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[头盔](/wiki/%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "头盔")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**皮帽**（leather hat）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.5 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [5.6 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的角色若在游戏开始时会获得[钢盔](/wiki/%E9%92%A2%E7%9B%94 "钢盔")，则改为获得一顶精灵皮帽。不过，由于游戏里精灵角色的可选职业中没有起始会获得钢盔的职业，该替换机制在游戏中不会发生[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

非[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")的[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")族怪物生成时有1⁄2的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一顶精灵皮帽[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时有7⁄8的概率获得一顶随机头盔，该头盔有3⁄25的概率会是精灵皮帽，因此玩家怪物生成时有10.5%的概率获得精灵皮帽[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")和[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物生成时，其头盔有3⁄4的概率会被替换掉（巫师的头盔可能会被换成[卓越头盔](/wiki/%E5%8D%93%E8%B6%8A%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "卓越头盔")，医生和牧师的头盔可能会被换成卓越头盔或[感知头盔](/wiki/%E6%84%9F%E7%9F%A5%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "感知头盔")），因此他们最终获得精灵皮帽的概率是约2.63%[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

## 描述

精灵皮帽的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1。精灵皮帽的材料不是[金属类](/index.php?title=%E9%87%91%E5%B1%9E%E7%B1%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "金属类 (page does not exist)")，因此不会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")，但也无法减免[落石陷阱](/index.php?title=%E8%90%BD%E7%9F%B3%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "落石陷阱 (page does not exist)")或[大地卷轴](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A7%E5%9C%B0%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "大地卷轴 (page does not exist)")造成的落石的伤害。

和其他[精灵族防具](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E6%97%8F%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵族防具 (page does not exist)")一样，精灵皮帽可以在附魔值不大于+5的情况下安全地附魔，其他大多数防具都只能在附魔值不大于+3时安全附魔。

## 策略

精灵皮帽是游戏中不阻碍施法的头盔中最轻的一种。一般来说，游戏前期更推荐穿戴金属制头盔，这样可以避免因落石陷阱而受到过高的伤害，施法的角色可以在施法的时候暂时摘下头盔。[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")和[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")由于初始拥有[长袍](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E8%A2%8D "长袍")，因此不需要过于担心金属头盔的施法惩罚。[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")和[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")则更适合戴着精灵皮帽。

精灵皮帽的附魔可以提升到很高的等级，因此适合用作[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")的对象。精灵皮帽也很适合作为施法角色的中后期装备，甚至进入大多数角色的[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")（卓越头盔和[巫师帽](/wiki/%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%E5%B8%BD "巫师帽")不易获取，其他实用的头盔都会阻碍施法）。精灵皮帽在[葛汉诺姆](/index.php?title=%E8%91%9B%E6%B1%89%E8%AF%BA%E5%A7%86\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "葛汉诺姆 (page does not exist)")很容易被[烧焦](/index.php?title=%E7%83%A7%E7%84%A6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "烧焦 (page does not exist)")，不过由于它的基础AC只有1，因此没有太大的必要做防侵蚀处理。

## 历史

精灵皮帽最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Elven_leather_helm/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") systems, the elven leather helm may be referred to as simply an **elven helm**, and may appear as a **hat** when unidentified. Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven helm.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") [Undead Slayers](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") that would start with a helmet instead receive an elven leather helm, using the existing vanilla code for player race-role substitutions. Non-undead elven monsters have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with an elven leather helm, compared to 1⁄2 in *NetHack*.

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a [fedora](/wiki/Fedora "Fedora") will produce an elven leather helm, and vice versa.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the elven leather helm grants +1 AC to elves that wear them, including player elves.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the elven leather helm is replaced with the elven helm, which grants 1 AC and 1 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn, and appears as a **runed helm** when unidentified - it does not randomly generate, weighs 10 aum and has a base object material of [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood"). The [leather helm](/index.php?title=Leather_helm_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Leather helm (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") exists as a separate item that generates randomly.

The Ruined Temple of the [Chaos Temple Quest](/wiki/Chaos_Temple_Quest "Chaos Temple Quest") contains an uncursed +0 leather elven helm in one of its chests. The [half-elf ranger](/wiki/Half-elf_ranger "Half-elf ranger") of the rebel leader's party that serves as [quest nemeses](/wiki/Quest_nemeses "Quest nemeses") for the default [Noble quest](/wiki/Noble_quest "Noble quest") will generate with an elven helm.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the elven leather helm grants +1 AC to elves that wear them, including player elves. Elven [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") start the game with elven helms in place of the standard helmet.

[Shopkeepers](/wiki/Shopkeeper "Shopkeeper") have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with an elven helm, and [elven wizards](/wiki/Elven_wizard "Elven wizard") and [centaurs](/wiki/Centaur_\(monster_class\) "Centaur (monster class)") have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with an elven helm. Elven [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenaries "Mercenaries") will often generate with an elven helm, and the helm also appears in the kits of various [player monsters](/wiki/Player_monster_\(EvilHack\) "Player monster (EvilHack)").

A cloth elven helm with the [oilskin](/index.php?title=Oilskin_\(object_property\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Oilskin (object property) (page does not exist)") [object property](/wiki/Object_properties#EvilHack "Object properties") is an incredibly popular [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for an EvilHack ascension kit, as it provides stellar protection against brain-eating attacks from the revamped [zombies](/wiki/Zombie_\(EvilHack\) "Zombie (EvilHack)") as well as [mind flayers](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer"), some [shambling horrors](/wiki/Shambling_horror "Shambling horror") and the especially-threatening [alhoons](/wiki/Alhoon "Alhoon").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, elven [Paladins](/wiki/Paladin_\(role\) "Paladin (role)") start with an elven leather helm in place of the standard helmet. [Pookas](/wiki/Pooka "Pooka") have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with an elven leather helm.

SlashTHEM also incorporates the Noble role and its quest, including the half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that generates with an elven leather helm.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), [padawans](/wiki/Padawan "Padawan") have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with an elven helm. Details for the elven helm in EvilHack are applicable to Hack'EM.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 199](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L199)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 227](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L227)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 159](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L159)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 193](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L193)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 219](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L219)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 253](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L253)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Elven leather helm/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Elven leather helm
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   精灵皮帽  
外观 皮帽
装备槽位 头盔
AC 1
特殊效果

（无）

基础价 8 zm
重量 3
材料 皮革

精灵皮帽（elven leather helm）是NetHack中的一种头盔类防具。它由皮革制成，未鉴定时外观为皮帽（leather hat）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 UnNetHack
    • 5.3 dNetHack
    • 5.4 EvilHack
    • 5.5 SlashTHEM
    • 5.6 Hack'EM
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

精灵族的角色若在游戏开始时会获得钢盔，则改为获得一顶精灵皮帽。不过，由于游戏里精灵角色的可选职业中没有起始会获得钢盔的职业，该替换机制在游戏中不会发生[1]。

非亡灵的精灵族怪物生成时有1⁄2的概率获得一顶精灵皮帽[2]。

玩家怪物在生成时有7⁄8的概率获得一顶随机头盔，该头盔有3⁄25的概率会是精灵皮帽，因此玩家怪物生成时有10.5%的概率获得精灵皮帽[3]。医生、牧师和巫师职业的玩家怪物生成时，其头盔有3⁄4的概率会被替换掉（巫师的头盔可能会被换成卓越头盔，医生和牧师的头盔可能会被换成卓越头盔或感知头盔），因此他们最终获得精灵皮帽的概率是约2.63%[4][5][6]。

描述

精灵皮帽的基础AC加成为1。精灵皮帽的材料不是金属类，因此不会阻碍施法，但也无法减免落石陷阱或大地卷轴造成的落石的伤害。

和其他精灵族防具一样，精灵皮帽可以在附魔值不大于+5的情况下安全地附魔，其他大多数防具都只能在附魔值不大于+3时安全附魔。

策略

精灵皮帽是游戏中不阻碍施法的头盔中最轻的一种。一般来说，游戏前期更推荐穿戴金属制头盔，这样可以避免因落石陷阱而受到过高的伤害，施法的角色可以在施法的时候暂时摘下头盔。僧侣和牧师由于初始拥有长袍，因此不需要过于担心金属头盔的施法惩罚。医生和巫师则更适合戴着精灵皮帽。

精灵皮帽的附魔可以提升到很高的等级，因此适合用作批量变形的对象。精灵皮帽也很适合作为施法角色的中后期装备，甚至进入大多数角色的飞升套件（卓越头盔和巫师帽不易获取，其他实用的头盔都会阻碍施法）。精灵皮帽在葛汉诺姆很容易被烧焦，不过由于它的基础AC只有1，因此没有太大的必要做防侵蚀处理。

历史

精灵皮帽最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

In variants with object materials systems, the elven leather helm may be referred to as simply an elven helm, and may appear as a hat when unidentified. Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven helm.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, elven Undead Slayers that would start with a helmet instead receive an elven leather helm, using the existing vanilla code for player race-role substitutions. Non-undead elven monsters have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with an elven leather helm, compared to 1⁄2 in NetHack.

Upgrading a fedora will produce an elven leather helm, and vice versa.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the elven leather helm grants +1 AC to elves that wear them, including player elves.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the elven leather helm is replaced with the elven helm, which grants 1 AC and 1 DR while worn, and appears as a runed helm when unidentified - it does not randomly generate, weighs 10 aum and has a base object material of wood. The leather helm exists as a separate item that generates randomly.

The Ruined Temple of the Chaos Temple Quest contains an uncursed +0 leather elven helm in one of its chests. The half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that serves as quest nemeses for the default Noble quest will generate with an elven helm.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the elven leather helm grants +1 AC to elves that wear them, including player elves. Elven Knights start the game with elven helms in place of the standard helmet.

Shopkeepers have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with an elven helm, and elven wizards and centaurs have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with an elven helm. Elven mercenaries will often generate with an elven helm, and the helm also appears in the kits of various player monsters.

A cloth elven helm with the oilskin object property is an incredibly popular wish for an EvilHack ascension kit, as it provides stellar protection against brain-eating attacks from the revamped zombies as well as mind flayers, some shambling horrors and the especially-threatening alhoons.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, elven Paladins start with an elven leather helm in place of the standard helmet. Pookas have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with an elven leather helm.

SlashTHEM also incorporates the Noble role and its quest, including the half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that generates with an elven leather helm.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, padawans have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with an elven helm. Details for the elven helm in EvilHack are applicable to Hack'EM.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 199
  2. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 227
  3. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 159
  4. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 193
  5. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 219
  6. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 253

{{armor/zh-CN
  |color=leather color
  |name=精灵皮帽
  |appearance=皮帽
  |cost=8
  |slot=头盔
  |ac=1
  |weight=3
  |material=皮革
}}
'''精灵皮帽'''（elven leather helm）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[头盔]]类[[防具]]。它由[[皮革]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''皮帽'''（leather hat）。

== 生成 ==
[[精灵（起始种族）|精灵]]族的角色若在游戏开始时会获得[[钢盔]]，则改为获得一顶精灵皮帽。不过，由于游戏里精灵角色的可选职业中没有起始会获得钢盔的职业，该替换机制在游戏中不会发生{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|199|nethack=3.6.7}}。

非[[亡灵]]的[[精灵（怪物属性）|精灵]]族怪物生成时有{{frac|2}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一顶精灵皮帽{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|227|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[玩家怪物]]在生成时有{{frac|7|8}}的概率获得一顶随机头盔，该头盔有{{frac|3|25}}的概率会是精灵皮帽，因此玩家怪物生成时有10.5%的概率获得精灵皮帽{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|159|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[医生（玩家怪物）|医生]]、[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]和[[巫师（玩家怪物）|巫师]]职业的玩家怪物生成时，其头盔有{{frac|3|4}}的概率会被替换掉（巫师的头盔可能会被换成[[卓越头盔]]，医生和牧师的头盔可能会被换成卓越头盔或[[感知头盔]]），因此他们最终获得精灵皮帽的概率是约2.63%{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|193|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|219|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|253|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 描述 ==
精灵皮帽的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1。精灵皮帽的材料不是[[金属类]]，因此不会阻碍[[施法]]，但也无法减免[[落石陷阱]]或[[大地卷轴]]造成的落石的伤害。

和其他[[精灵族防具]]一样，精灵皮帽可以在附魔值不大于+5的情况下安全地附魔，其他大多数防具都只能在附魔值不大于+3时安全附魔。

== 策略 ==
精灵皮帽是游戏中不阻碍施法的头盔中最轻的一种。一般来说，游戏前期更推荐穿戴金属制头盔，这样可以避免因落石陷阱而受到过高的伤害，施法的角色可以在施法的时候暂时摘下头盔。[[僧侣]]和[[牧师]]由于初始拥有[[长袍]]，因此不需要过于担心金属头盔的施法惩罚。[[医生]]和[[巫师]]则更适合戴着精灵皮帽。

精灵皮帽的附魔可以提升到很高的等级，因此适合用作[[批量变形]]的对象。精灵皮帽也很适合作为施法角色的中后期装备，甚至进入大多数角色的[[飞升套件]]（卓越头盔和[[巫师帽]]不易获取，其他实用的头盔都会阻碍施法）。精灵皮帽在[[葛汉诺姆]]很容易被[[烧焦]]，不过由于它的基础AC只有1，因此没有太大的必要做防侵蚀处理。

== 历史 ==
精灵皮帽最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
In variants with [[object materials]] systems, the elven leather helm may be referred to as simply an '''elven helm''', and may appear as a '''hat''' when unidentified. Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven helm.

===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[Elf (starting race)|elven]] [[Undead Slayer]]s that would start with a helmet instead receive an elven leather helm, using the existing vanilla code for player race-role substitutions. Non-undead elven monsters have a {{frac|6}} chance of generating with an elven leather helm, compared to {{frac|2}} in ''NetHack''.

[[Upgrading]] a [[fedora]] will produce an elven leather helm, and vice versa.

===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], the elven leather helm grants +1 AC to elves that wear them, including player elves.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], the elven leather helm is replaced with the elven helm, which grants 1 AC and 1 [[DR]] while worn, and appears as a '''runed helm''' when unidentified - it does not randomly generate, weighs 10 aum and has a base object material of [[wood]]. The [[Leather helm (dNetHack)|leather helm]] exists as a separate item that generates randomly.

The Ruined Temple of the [[Chaos Temple Quest]] contains an uncursed +0 leather elven helm in one of its chests. The [[half-elf ranger]] of the rebel leader's party that serves as [[quest nemeses]] for the default [[Noble quest]] will generate with an elven helm.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], the elven leather helm grants +1 AC to elves that wear them, including player elves. Elven [[Knight]]s start the game with elven helms in place of the standard helmet.

[[Shopkeeper]]s have a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with an elven helm, and [[elven wizard]]s and [[Centaur (monster class)|centaurs]] have a {{frac|4}} chance of generating with an elven helm. Elven [[mercenaries]] will often generate with an elven helm, and the helm also appears in the kits of various [[Player monster (EvilHack)|player monsters]].

A cloth elven helm with the [[Oilskin (object property)|oilskin]] [[Object properties#EvilHack|object property]] is an incredibly popular [[wish]] for an EvilHack ascension kit, as it provides stellar protection against brain-eating attacks from the revamped [[Zombie (EvilHack)|zombies]] as well as [[mind flayer]]s, some [[shambling horror]]s and the especially-threatening [[alhoon]]s.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, elven [[Paladin (role)|Paladins]] start with an elven leather helm in place of the standard helmet. [[Pooka]]s have a {{frac|4}} chance of generating with an elven leather helm.

SlashTHEM also incorporates the Noble role and its quest, including the half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that generates with an elven leather helm.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], [[padawan]]s have a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with an elven helm. Details for the elven helm in EvilHack are applicable to Hack'EM.
